attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
If you care about the future of the Colchester Garrison Church and believe that it should be maintained for community use the join our campaign and make your voice heard.

The Save the Garrison Church action group represents people in Colchester and world wide who are keen to maintain this important historic building for community use. 


Concert venue rescue plan for Garrison Church 
Save the Garrison Church campaigners have devised a plan to save Colchester’s historic building as a venue for concerts and other cultural entertainments. 

The group believe the building offers a large unique space providing opportunities for a wide range of cultural activities and events for people of ages – arts, drama, entertainments, exhibitions and celebrations.
